meeting_info.organization: Parks, Trails, and the Environment Committee
meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, Dallas, Texas; Virtual via video conference

agenda_items.title: Approval of the April 1, 2024 Parks, Trails and Environment Committee Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: 2024 Summer Aquatics Preview
agenda_items.description: Preview of the summer aquatics program.
agenda_items.presenter: John Lawrence, Assistant Director, Parks and Recreation Department; Juan Robles, Superintendent, Aquatics, Parks and Recreation Department

agenda_items.title: Landscape Equipment Transition Incentive Plan Update
agenda_items.description: Update on the incentive plan for transitioning landscape equipment.
agenda_items.presenter: Carlos Evans, Director, Office of Environmental Quality and Sustainability; Paul White II, Assistant Director, Office of Environmental Quality and Sustainability; Freddie Ortiz, Environmental Coordinator II, Office of Environmental Quality and Sustainability

agenda_items.title: OEQS Department Budget Briefing
agenda_items.description: Briefing on the budget for the Office of Environmental Quality and Sustainability.
agenda_items.presenter: Carlos Evans, Director, Office of Environmental Quality and Sustainability; Sheila Delgado, Assistant Director, Office of Environmental Quality and Sustainability

agenda_items.title: Quarterly CECAP Update
agenda_items.description: Update on the quarterly progress of the CECAP.
agenda_items.presenter: Carlos Evans, Director, Office of Environmental Quality & Sustainability
